thread.title: Tottenham striker Harry Kane reveals change in diet has fuelled his blistering start to 2017
thread.title_full: Tottenham striker Harry Kane reveals change in diet has fuelled his blistering start to 2017

author: Joe Mewis
title: Tottenham striker Harry Kane reveals change in diet has fuelled his blistering start to 2017
text:
Sport Tottenham striker Harry Kane reveals change in diet has fuelled his blistering start to 2017 The Spurs frontman picked up the February player of the month award and has netted 14 times in 12 games this year Share Hungry for goals: Kane changed his diet in January (Photo: Getty Images)   
In-form Tottenham striker Harry Kane has revealed that a new diet is behind his red-hot goal streak in 2017. 
The England frontman leads the chase for the Premier League Golden Boot after a run of 14 goals in 12 since the the New Year was rung in. 
His brace against Everton last weekend means that needs only seven more goals to move past the 25 he scored in the league last season. 
He has three hat-tricks this year and after winning the Premier League player of the month award for February he told the Tottenham website about a diet change which he is reaping the rewards for. Kane has another trophy in his collection (Photo: @SpursOfficial /Twitter) 
"My diet has changed since January," he said. 
"I've got a new chef who I've been working with to help with my nutrition, to get me a bit leaner and quicker and that seems to be working." 
The 23-year-old will be hoping his hot streak continues when Spurs host Millwall in the FA Cup quarter-finals on Sunday, but paid tribute to his team-mates as he accepted the award. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
